Description: 16-day composite global vegetation indices (NDVI & EVI) at 1-km resolution
Monthly 500m burned area from MODIS (burn date of fire per pixel
Daily day/night land surface temperature and emissivity at 1 km from MODIS Terra (with quality flags and view angles)
8-day composite actual and potential evapotranspiration and latent heat flux (500 m) from MODIS Terra
Monthly global land surface model outputs (FEWS NET FLDAS Noah) – precipitation
Daily global land surface variables (incl. soil moisture and evapotranspiration) from GLDAS-2.2 (Catchment model with GRACE DA)
Monthly global precipitation (IMERG Final) at 0.1° with gauge adjustments
Daily global Normalized Difference Vegetation Index from AVHRR (Climate Data Record)
Daily 0.05° VIIRS NDVI Climate Data Record extending NDVI from 2014 to present
